0.3.name: wordpress/process-site-map
0.3.description:
My intention with this plugin was to create a site that could hold notes about the site map in a snap.

Takes the following format:

Home
    About Us
        Mission Statement
        The Team
        Location
    Projects
        Client 1
        Client 2
        Client 3
            Design
            Development
            Conclusion
            Contact Us

…and turns it into nested pages.
